definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: The fur was as soft as velvet.
sentences.chinese: 這毛皮有如天鵝絨般軟滑。

sentences.english: Underneath their fur, polar bears have an additional 10-cm-layer of fat, called blubber.
sentences.chinese: 在毛皮的下面還有一層十釐米厚的脂肪，名爲鯨脂。

sentences.english: People hunt the ermine for its beautiful fur.
sentences.chinese: 人們捕獵白鼬，以獲取它那美麗的毛皮。

sentences.english: The current  occurrence of  torrent  spurs him to buy fur and  sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 現行的傾瀉事件驅使他買毛皮衣服和硫磺。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a fur paste-up reel which belongs to the field of brede craftwork products.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及刺繡工藝製品領域的毛皮拼貼卷軸。

sentences.english: Slide access notebook compartment is lined in faux fur for optimum protection.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片訪問筆記本車廂兩旁是人造毛皮最佳的保護。

sentences.english: The dog's fur was matted with blood.
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗的毛皮上沾有血跡。

sentences.english: It keeps the pelt clean and removes parasites.
sentences.chinese: 它讓毛皮清潔和去除寄生蟲。

sentences.english: The expensive fur of a mink .
Hooded jacket lined with faux fur.
sentences.chinese: 與人造毛皮內襯連帽外套。

sentences.english: Multi-step fatliquoring theory was applicated in the processing of fur.
sentences.chinese: 在毛皮加工實踐中，合理應用了分步加油理論。

sentences.english: Of bosomy rose with fur gloves on.
sentences.chinese: 帶着毛皮手套的飽滿的玫瑰花。

sentences.english: Goats are valued either for their fleeces or their milk.
sentences.chinese: 山羊的價值在於人們需要它的毛皮和奶。

sentences.english: Even their heavy fur-lined coats could net keep out the piercing cold.
sentences.chinese: 甚至他們的厚毛皮裏大衣也擋不住刺骨的寒冷。

sentences.english: It has been trapped for its valuable Brownish Black fur.
sentences.chinese: 常被誘捕以獲取其貴重的淺棕黑色毛皮。

sentences.english: Its fur is yellow-brown, with a darker vest and collar.
sentences.chinese: 它的毛皮呈黃褐色，前胸後背與頸項的顏色要深一些。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
